Message.En: The Lullaby Echoing in the Ruins

Message.Jp: 遺跡に打ち棄てられた遺物を回収する

Message.En:
There have been reports of damage believed to be 
caused by violent creatures in 
<NAME AREA>, 
although the information is uncertain.
Message.Jp:
不確実な情報だが、<NAME AREA>から
狂暴な魔物のしわざと思われる被害報告があった

Message.En:
I have discovered traces of monsters.
Swift pursuit is deemed essential.
I will now search for their dwelling 
and eliminate them.
If I do not return even after sunset, 
I request assistance.
Message.Jp:
我、魔物の痕跡を発見せり
速やかなる追跡が必須と判断
これよりやつらの住処を探り討伐を果たす
日暮れをすぎても我が戻らぬ場合は応援を請う

Message.En: Be alert for enemies and pick up items that have fallen in the area (10 left)
Message.Jp: 敵に警戒し辺りに落ちたアイテムを拾う（残り１０）
